src:
Pariz je video pravog Novaka: Sedmi teniser sveta počišćen za manje od sat vremena
01 Nov 2019, 17:11 by Zile
Novak Đoković – Stefanos Cicipas 2:0 (6:1, 6:2)
Novak Đoković je u polufinalu Mastersa u Parizu. Furioznom igrom, najboljom u „gradu svetlosti“ ove godine Đoković je deklasirao Stefanosa Cicipasa i revanširao mu se za poraz od pre dvadesetak dana u Šangaju.
Nakon ne preterano ubedljivog izdanja protiv Mutea i Edmunda u prva dva meča, očekivao se daleko teži posao protiv sedmog tenisera sveta.
Međutim desilo se potpuno suprotno – Đoković je za samo 28 minuta potpuno počistio Cicipasa sa terena u prvom setu. Ekspresno je poveo sa 5:0 i došao do tri vezane set lopte u šestom gemu, ali se Cicipas malo trgnuo, servis ga je poslužio i uspeo je da set ne izgubi sa nulom.
Ako je to bila najava neizvesnijeg drugog seta trajala je vrlo kratko, Cicipas je poveo sa 1:0, međutim u narednih pet gemova ga nigde nije bilo, a Đoković je nemilosrdno grabio ka plasmanu u polufinale.
Pri rezultatu 5:1 Cicipas je uspeo da prekine Novakovu seriju, ali je to bilo sve od njega – Đoković je za manje od jednog časa došao do konačnog trijumfa.
Novakov protivnik u subotnjem polufinalu biće Grigor Dimitrov.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Paris saw the real Novak: The world's seventh tennis player cleared in less than an hour
01 Nov 2019, 16:11 by Zile
Novak Djokovic - Stefanos Cicipas 2-0 (6-1, 6-2)
Novak Djokovic is in the semi-finals of the Masters in Paris. With a furious game, the best in the "city of light" this year, Djokovic declassified Stefanos Cicipas and remade him for a 20-day defeat in Shanghai.
After a not-so-convincing bet against Mute and Edmund in the first two matches, a much tougher job was expected against the world's seventh tennis player.
However, the opposite was the case - Djokovic completely cleared Cicipas from the field in the first set in just 28 minutes. He took a quick 5-0 lead and came up with three tied set balls in the sixth game, but Cicipas jerked a bit, the serve served him and managed to keep the set from scratch.
If it was the announcement of a more uncertain second set, it took very short time, Cicipas increased by 1-0, but in the next five games he was nowhere to go, and Djokovic ruthlessly raced to the semifinals.
At 5-1, Cicipas managed to break Novak's streak, but that was all he did - Djokovic reached the final triumph in less than an hour.
Novak's opponent in Saturday's semifinal will be Grigor Dimitrov.
